thread.title: Comcast to Launch Comedy-Focused Subscription Video Service
thread.title_full: Comcast to Launch Comedy-Focused Subscription Video Service - WSJ

author: Shalini Ramachandran
title: Comcast to Launch Comedy-Focused Subscription Video Service
text:
Comcast Corp.â€™s NBCUniversal said Thursday it will launch a comedy-focused subscription video service for $3.99 a month featuring content from the likes of Jimmy Fallon and other talent.
The new on-demand streaming service, which will be called Seeso, will be available widely in January. It was developed in a ten-month sprint led by NBCUniversal Executive Vice President Evan Shapiro. At an event in New York, Mr. Shapiro emphasized...
